properties.description: Every Friday morning 10 till 12 we offer a friendly environment to come and get a warm drink and cake. For anyone of any age. Place to make new friendships, have some giggles. We also have jigsaws, colouring, domino's, games ect.. available to those who wish to use and at the end if every month we do either a craft, quiz, bingo ect...
properties.title: Drop In

properties.address:
Cletwr Cafe
Tre'r Ddol,
Ceredigion,
SY20 8PN
properties.description:
A warm welcome space in Cletwr café. Visitors can be reassured that they will be provided a space to sit, undisturbed in our cafe area surrounded by a safe and friendly atmosphere, with staff on hand to
assist with any additional needs. Plug sockets available, visitors are welcome to browse the second hand book section.
properties.name: Cletwr Cafe

properties.address:
The Iron Room,Furnace,
Eglwys Fach,
SY20 8SY
properties.contact: Harry Toland and Claire Toland: hht@aber.ac.uk, clizztoland@gmail.com
properties.description: A warm welcome awaits on Tuesday afternoons, from 2-4pm for anyone who’d like to get out of the house for a couple of hours and meet up with others from the community to hang out and chat, or to sit quietly in company whilst someone brings you a cup of tea and a biscuit. As before there will be some board games available, CDs playing (bring along your favourite to play if you’d like to), and mostly people just chat over a warm drink. It’s hoped that there will be the occasional special event or activity planned..
properties.name: The Iron Room

properties.description: Coffee and chat for parishioners and friends. On the 3rd Wednesday of every month at 10.30.

properties.description:
Cwtsh Cynnes
Come and chat, meet old and new friends and enjoy the warmth of the company. The Warm Space is held in Ystafell Waelod, Talybont Memorial Hall. Hot drinks and biscuits available.
Everyone is welcome, including children. There are some toys, games and colouring books for children. Home Start Pre School Group. We offer families, warm space, hot refreshments and food for the children. Tal y Bont Youth club Youth club for 10 -16 year olds.
